dashboard.title: AI Model Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Real-time monitoring and analytics for AI model performance

activeModels.title: Active Models Trend
help: Tracks the number of AI models available for API calls in real-time.
Higher numbers indicate more AI service options available.

availability.title: Average Availability
help: Shows the average uptime percentage of all AI models.

performance.title: Model Performance Overview
help: Visualizes the operational status of AI models.

activity.title: Activity Feed
activity.description: Activities will appear here in real-time

alerts.apiMode: Running in API mode for optimal Vercel performance. Data refreshes every 30 seconds.

monitoring.title: System Monitoring
monitoring.subtitle: Real-time system metrics and performance overview

unifiedChart.title: System Overview
unifiedChart.description: Combined metrics for models, availability, and performance
help: Combines active models, availability, and performance metrics in one view
Left axis shows model counts, right axis shows availability percentage
Lines show different model status trends over time
